ts_recv.description: Capture-server-received timestamp expressed as the number of nanoseconds since the UNIX epoch.

ts_event.description: Matching-engine-received timestamp expressed as the number of nanoseconds since the UNIX epoch.

channel_id.description: Channel ID assigned by Databento as an incrementing integer starting at zero.

rtype.description: Record type. Each schema corresponds with a single rtype value.

order_id.description: Order ID assigned at the venue.

publisher_id.description: Publisher ID assigned by Databento, denoting dataset and venue.

flags.description: Bit field indicating event end, message characteristics, and data quality.

ts_in_delta.description: Matching-engine-sending timestamp expressed as the number of nanoseconds before ts_recv.

action.description: Event action: Add, Cancel, Modify, Clear book, Trade, Fill, or None.

sequence.description: Message sequence number assigned at the venue.

side.description: Initiating side: Ask, Bid, or None.

price.description: Order price as a signed integer where 1 unit equals 1e-9 (0.000000001).
